local_intent: Perform the pulling motion along +x by 0.2 m with correct yaw and stable grasp, then verify the drawer is open.
assumptions: Robot is positioned at the drawer front and aligned to the handle
coherence_with_global: Respects the global plan: after grasp and yaw set, executes MoveDelta(x,0.2,1500) to open the drawer and checks ContainerOpen.
